# save(to:)

**Instance Method**

Saves the web history to the specified file.

## Declaration

```swift
func save(to URL: URL!) throws
```

## Parameters

- **URL**: The URL of the file to contain the web history information. The file must be user-writable, but its format is private and should not be edited directly.

## Discussion

When successful, this method posts a notification ([doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WebHistorySavedNotification]).



## Loading and Saving History Information

- **load(from:)**: Loads the contents of the specified web history file.
